SEARCH
Package io.github.blyznytsiaorg.bibernate.dao.jdbc.dsl

Class SelectQueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.github.blyznytsiaorg.bibernate.dao.jdbc.dsl.QueryBuilder
io.github.blyznytsiaorg.bibernate.dao.jdbc.dsl.SelectQueryBuilder
public class SelectQueryBuilder extends QueryBuilder
Represents a SQL SELECT query builder for constructing SELECT statements with optional clauses such as JOIN, WHERE, GROUP BY, HAVING, and UNION. Extends the base class QueryBuilder.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Blyzhnytsia Team
